0.title: Service Response Time
0.query:
timeseries avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.response_time = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.service.request.response_time)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.response_time desc
| limit 10

1.title: Process CPU Usage
1.query:
timeseries avg(dt.process.cpu.usage), by: { dt.entity.process_group_instance }
| fieldsAdd process.cpu.usage = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.process.cpu.usage)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.process_group_instance, "entity.name")
| sort process.cpu.usage desc
| limit 10

2.title: Host CPU Usage
2.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.cpu.usage = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.cpu.usage)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name")
| sort host.cpu.usage desc
| limit 10

12.title: Service Failures
12.query:
timeseries sum(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.failure_count desc
| limit 20

13.title: Service Failures

| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = arraySum(`sum(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.service, "entity.name")
| sort service.request.failure_count desc
| limit 20
